title: Brown shrimp and potato salad
description: Warm potatoes, oozing poached egg yolk and a herb-filled shrimp salad combine in this comforting spring supper.
ingredients: 3 large potatoes, peeled, sliced into discs 1cm/½in thick
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 savoury muffins, warmed in the oven (optional)
